post.title: Introducing Polymer ViewPager
post.content: Polymer ViewPager support unlimited page content.

content.text: Polymer ViewPager support unlimited page content. If anyone happen to be working on Android before, Polymer Cmidt ViewPager is working similary fashion. ViewPager is in an early state. With that in mind there will be bugs so please don't hasitated to report the bugs.

## Add dependency Install dependency with command "bower install https://github.com/cmidt-veasna/cmidt-viewpager.git --save" ## Define ViewPager ```html ``` You can set item to ViewPager with iron-ajax or manually. ViewPager provide customization to the binding item variable and index same as other Polymer component with "as" and "indexAs". ViewPager rely on iron-scroll-target-behavior to listen the scroll change and populate necessary page. ## Customize style You can completely customize ViewPager style and page style with custom css properties. For more information regarding css custom properties visit https://cmidt-veasna.github.io/polymer/components/cmidt-viewpager/ ```css --cmidt-page { margin-bottom: 40px; } ``` ## Listen to Event By default, ViewPager provide build in control such as indicator, next and previous button to move the page around. Thought ViewPager provide custom css properties to allow the host to styling those component, there will be a time when you want to create your own component to control ViewPager such indicator ...etc. ViewPager provide a few event such as `on-page-selected`, `on-page-state-changed` and `on-lower-threshold`. For more information visit https://cmidt-veasna.github.io/polymer/components/cmidt-viewpager/ ## Demo visit https://cmidt-veasna.github.io/polymer/components/cmidt-viewpager/demo
Cmidt Polymer ViewPager work on all moderm brower Chrome, Safari, Firefox have been tested and should also work on IE Edge and IE 11 (Haven't Test Yet).

post.title: Introducing Polymer Option Menu
post.content: Polymer option menu is a resposive option menu which collapse your menu item and put your the menu item into a dropdown overflow menu.

content.text: Polymer option menu is a resposive option menu which collapse your menu item and put your the menu item into a dropdown overflow menu. The option menu item working similary to Android Option Menu however there are a few feature such as expand and collapsed item is not avaialble instead switchable item is included.

## Add dependency

Install dependency with command "bower install https://github.com/cmidt-veasna/cmidt-optionmenu.git --save"

## Define Option Menu

```html
<cmidt-option-menu id="option">
    <cmidt-option-menu-item id="shopping" title="add shopping" icon="icons:add-shopping-cart"></cmidt-option-menu-item>
    <cmidt-option-menu-item id="create" title="create" icon="icons:create" disabled></cmidt-option-menu-item>
    <cmidt-option-menu-switchable-item id="switchable0" auto>
        <cmidt-option-menu-item id="download" title="download" icon="icons:cloud-download" selected></cmidt-option-menu-item>
        <cmidt-option-menu-item id="past" title="paste" icon="icons:content-paste"></cmidt-option-menu-item>
    </cmidt-option-menu-switchable-item>
    <cmidt-option-menu-item id="copy" title="copy" icon="icons:content-copy" alway-hide></cmidt-option-menu-item>
    <cmidt-option-menu-item id="attachment" title="attachement" icon="icons:attachment" alway-hide></cmidt-option-menu-item>
    <cmidt-option-menu-item id="fingerprint" title="fingerprint" icon="icons:fingerprint" alway-hide></cmidt-option-menu-item>
</cmidt-option-menu>
```

Option menu will automatically hide menu item if there is no space available. The option menu provided the behavior where you can
create your own menu item and switchable item as you needed. See the demo code for custom menu item.

Option menu support horizontal and vertical orientation. You can place your menu as vertical or horizontal. See more detail at

## Customize style

You can customize a few thing with custom css properties. For more information regarding css custom properties
visit https://cmidt-veasna.github.io/polymer/polymer/components/cmidt-optionmenu

## Listen to Event

Option menu will fire every tap or click on menu item.

1. `on-item-tap` will fire when user tap or click on Menu item regardless is it a switchable or a normal item. You should check the id of item in order to determine which item was tap or click. Also, there is a property `overflow` which identify the item was tap or click from
overflow menu or from option menu itself.
2. `on-overflow-item-tap` will fire when user tap on the overflow button (By default is 3 dots icon).

For more information visit https://cmidt-veasna.github.io/polymer/polymer/components/cmidt-optionmenu

## Demo

visit https://cmidt-veasna.github.io/polymer/polymer/components/cmidt-optionmenu/demo
Cmidt Polymer Option Menu work on all moderm brower Chrome, Safari, Firefox have been tested and should also work on IE Edge and IE 11 (Haven't Test Yet).
